basicQuest.title: Balance a Rock
basicQuest.instructions: Balancing a rock is more than just a challenge â€” it's a meditation. It requires patience, stillness, and just the right touch. When the world feels shaky, find your still point and stack a little peace.

AiSnap.taskDescription: a balanced rock or a rock stack
